name: Ruined House Escape Games
description:
------------------------------------------------

'Wow! This Game Is Just Amazing! Excitement All The Way!'
'This Free Game Exceeded My Expectations! Download Now!'
'Downright Fun! My Kid Can't Stop Playing It!'
'I Love It When I Reach The Bottom And Catch The Bag Of Gold!'

---------------------------------------------------------------


Friends do you like taking up challenges in your life? Have you ever been in a mostly challenging situations ever before? If no and you like to be in one then here is your chance to be in the mostly challenging game in your life.


Welcome to Ruined House Escape - a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with Ruined House Escape - a cool escape game?

Can You Escape - Ruined House is a point and click escape game. A boy had been abducted and locked up in a ruined house.

Your duty now is to help the boy escape from the ruined house. Move around the house and find ways to release the boy from the room by relating objects and solving puzzles. Have fun!




Game features:

• Genuine story!
• Innovative puzzles!
• Stunning graphics!
• Realistic atmosphere!
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Gorgeous graphics !
• No signup's required, just download and install!
